results.name: Cat Herders: Couch Coop Cat Corralling!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
